title: Senior Fullstack .Net
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Erfarenhet av ServiceNow med incidenthantering enligt ITIL, som har förvärvats under de senaste 5 åren
* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av .NET, med kontinuerlig användning under de senaste 5 åren
* Erfarenhet av att ha jobbat med .net Framework Webforms under de senaste 5 åren
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av OpenID
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av IAM
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av Oracle SQL och Active MQ
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av Kubernetes och containermiljöer
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av Rest API utveckling
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med Legacy system inom offentlig sektor

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer via Mulesoft
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med UX/UI och Designsystem
* Erfarenhet av Legacy system byggda i .Net Framework
* Erfarenhet av Octopus deploy

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 27-11-2025 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Product Managers
description:
*Vill du leda teamen bakom Sveriges största streamingtjänst och vara drivande i resan mot nästa generations tittarupplevelse?*


Hos TV4 möts teknik, innovation och underhållning. TV4 söker nu Product Managers som vill vara med och forma framtiden för Sveriges största streamingtjänst. Oavsett om ditt hjärta klappar lite extra för användarupplevelse eller affärstillväxt, blir du en nyckelperson i hur miljoner tittare upplever rörlig bild varje dag.

**Om rollerna**
---------------


Som Product Manager på TV4 blir du en del av Product Competence-teamet och leder ett tvärfunktionellt team inom ett tydligt produktområde, bestående av utvecklare, designers och andra specialister. Du samarbetar nära kollegor inom produkt, tech, design och affär för att skapa en tjänst som både engagerar och levererar mätbara resultat. Du kommer att ha ett nordiskt ansvar, vilket innebär att du arbetar med både TV4 Play i Sverige och MTV Katsomo i Finland. Två marknader där vi tillsammans formar framtidens streamingupplevelse.


Vi söker dig som Product Manager till **Content Experience**, där du vill driva och utveckla vår användarupplevelse, från sökfunktioner och spelare till interaktioner.


Vi söker också dig till **Consumer Growth & Retention**, där du vill fokusera på tillväxt, lojalitet och konverteringsoptimering.



Gemensamt för båda rollerna är att du arbetar datadrivet, tvärfunktionellt och med starkt fokus på användarvärde. Du växlar mellan strategi och detaljer, och trivs i en miljö där teknik, design och affär möts. Hos TV4 får du möjlighet att påverka i stor skala och vara en del av en organisation på en spännande resa mot empowered product teams.

**Du kommer att:**

* Definiera och kommunicera produktens roadmap i linje med TV4s vision och strategi.
* Leda product discovery tillsammans med design och utveckling för att förstå användarnas behov.
* Analysera användar- och produktdata för att generera idéer till nya funktioner och produkter.
* Sätta upp och följa upp KPI:er.
* Samarbeta med Area Lead, Engineering Manager och andra viktiga stakeholders för att identifiera lösningar som är önskvärda, genomförbara och hållbara.

**Vem du är**
-------------


För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med produkter med höga krav på användarupplevelse, tillgänglighet och skalbarhet. Du har flera års erfarenhet av produktutveckling inom tech-miljöer och har som Product Manager lett tvärfunktionella team bestående av utvecklare, designers och jobbat nära stakeholders.


Du är datadriven och triggas av mätbarhet och tydliga resultat, samtidigt som du har förmågan att se helheten och förstå hur produkt, teknik och affär samspelar.


Du är proaktiv och prestigelös, tar initiativ och får saker att hända. Du motiveras av att arbeta i en organisation som befinner sig på en transformationsresa mot empowered product teams, där du får vara med och forma hur framtidens produktarbete ser ut på TV4.

**Dina styrkor och erfarenheter:**

* Van att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt med produkt, design, utveckling, marknad, CX, försäljning och juridik.
* Erfarenhet av leverans- och lanseringsprocesser.
* Datadriven och analytisk, med fokus på KPI:er och tydliga resultat.
* Trygg teknisk förståelse och förmåga att agera bollplank i komplexa beslut.
* Kan kombinera strategiskt tänkande med hands-on närvaro i det dagliga arbetet.

**Det är ett plus om du har:**

* Teknisk bakgrund är meriterande, till exempel ingenjörsutbildning, eller erfarenhet av att arbeta nära utvecklingsteam.
* Erfarenhet av UX- och användarcentrerad produktutveckling.
* Erfarenhet av affärsnära produktutveckling och konverteringsoptimering.
* Vana vid cyklisk produktutveckling och moderna agila arbetssätt.

**Detta får du hos TV4**
------------------------


Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm (TV4-huset) med gångavstånd till Gärdets tunnelbana. Kontoret erbjuder eget gym, parkeringsgarage, restaurang samt takterrass. Rollen erbjuder även:

* Kollektivavtal, med tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag m.m
* Vara en del av TV4s ekosystem och ta del av de tjänster som TV4 erbjuder sina kunder
* Rabatter via Benify
* En genuin kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling där du även har chans att växa inom vår organisation
* Arbete i team där vi tillsammans motiverar och driver TV4: till Sveriges bästa mediaplattform

**Praktisk information**


Vi tillämpar löpande urval och intervjuer – så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt genom ansök knappen! Den här tjänsten tillsätts i samarbete med Safemind.

* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med 6 månaders provanställning
* Facklig tillhörighet: Unionen eller SJF. Kontakta unionen@tv4.se eller sjf@tv4.se för frågor.

**Om TV4**
----------


TV4 har samlat Sverige i över 30 år, dygnet runt, varje dag. Miljontals besöker TV4 Play och våra sajter för att ta del av innehåll, när och var de vill. Din utveckling är viktig, både för dig och för TV4:s fortsatta resa.

title: Junior UX Researcher - Göteborg
description:
Uppdraget innebär att bidra i de arbetsprocesser som avdelningen för affärsutveckling driver. Det omfattar att hantera ärenden och aktiviteter som kommer både från politiska beslut och från organisationens verksamhetsplan. Konsulten kommer att ingå i ett team och verka i rollen som UX-researcher.


Arbetet sker både självständigt och i nära samarbete med andra funktioner. Det huvudsakliga ansvaret är att samla in omvärldsdata och förstå kundernas behov för att skapa välgrundade beslutsunderlag inom olika frågeställningar.

**Skallkrav:**

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av UX-research, inklusive förstudier, behovsanalys, kundförståelse, utforskande arbete samt att ta fram analyser och insikter med tydliga och balanserade sammanställningar för olika målgrupper.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och driva arbetet framåt.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift.
* Goda kunskaper i engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Stark förmåga att tydligt presentera och kommunicera resultat och resonemang, muntligt och skriftligt.
* Erfarenhet av försäljning och kunddialog inom tjänstesektorn.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta nära produktägare, UX och IT-utveckling inom ett agilt utvecklingsteam.
**Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av att skapa design och prototyper i Figma.
**Tillträde och ansökan:**


Startdatum: 24 nov 2025


Slutdatum: 30 mar 2026


Sista ansökningsdagen: 19 nov 2025


Ort: Göteborg


Kontaktperson: 0790 062 711


Urval och intervjuer sker löpande!


Sway Sourcing är en innovativ rekryteringspartner som specialiserar sig på att matcha rätt talang med rätt företag – snabbt och effektivt. Vårt huvudfokus ligger inom Ekonomi, Administration, HR, Marknad och IT, men vi har även den breda expertis och flexibilitet som krävs för att leverera skräddarsydda rekryteringslösningar inom alla branscher.


Trots att vi är en relativt ny aktör har vi redan byggt förtroende hos många av Sveriges största företag och arbetar både nationellt och internationellt. Med baser i Sverige och Spanien erbjuder vi en unik kombination av lokal expertis och global räckvidd. Vårt starka nätverk och djupa branschinsikter gör oss till en självklar partner för företag som vill ligga steget före i sin rekrytering.

title: Senior UX/UI Designer (consulting assignment)
description:
Do you want to help build the next generation of digital solutions for industrial monitoring and smarter decision-making? We’re looking for a senior UX/UI designer with a strong UI focus to help create modern, user-centered web solutions that truly make an impact in a complex and exciting domain


### **About the assignment**


You’ll join an experienced and collaborative UX/UI team where learning, teamwork and innovation are at the core. You will work closely with product owners, developers and designers to shape a web-based product that enables users to quickly and confidently detect machine issues.

### **Your responsibilities and daily tasks**

* Close collaboration with the UX/UI Lead, product owners and teams
* Initiate, participate in and contribute to frequent design reviews
* Drive standardisation and guide development teams in design rules
* Test and verify implemented UI design
* Work with stakeholders to understand needs
* Participate in scrum ceremonies
* Share insights, brainstorm and create meaningful value together

### **Who you are and what you value**

* You thrive in small, autonomous teams with a high degree of trust
* You have strong personal drive and take initiative when obstacles arise
* You enjoy collaboration and contribute to a supportive team culture
* You are curious and eager to understand a complex industrial domain
* You are comfortable in environments with some uncertainty — and excited by the chance to influence from day one

### **Requirements**

* Senior UX/UI designer with 5+ years of experience
* Extensive experience working in Figma
* A humble, non-prestigious approach to design and openness to sharing and discussing ideas early in the process
* Strong understanding of web and DOM-related principles
* Fluent in English; Swedish is a plus
* Experience with industrial applications is a plus

### **Tech environment**


React  

Svelte  

TypeScript  

Go  

PostgreSQL  

GIT  

AWS  

Docker  

K3S  

MongoDB  

Azure DevOps  

Figma  

Miro and more

### **Other details**


Start: As soon as possible  

Scope: 1 year with a strong possibility of extension  

Hybrid: Minimum 50% onsite  

Location: Luleå or Gothenburg


Sway Sourcing is an innovative recruitment partner specializing in matching the right talent with the right company—quickly and efficiently. Our primary focus lies in Finance, Administration, HR, Marketing, and IT, but we also have the broad expertise and flexibility required to deliver tailored recruitment solutions across all industries.


Although we are a relatively new player, we have already gained the trust of many of Sweden's largest companies and operate both nationally and internationally. With bases in Sweden and Spain, we offer a unique combination of local expertise and global reach. Our strong network and deep industry insights make us the obvious partner for companies looking to stay ahead in their recruitment efforts.

title: Presales Lead End User Services
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.


**The Role**


This Role sits at the heart of the customer business problem in creating and proposing the best of Capgemini as a solution that is a match for the client requirement. You engage with the customer, either proactively or via request, to draw out the business challenges that they have and align the Capgemini solution portfolio to it. Communicating the solution to the client, you demonstrate the value that Capgemini adds and how we are differentiated to meet and exceed their business needs.  

The role needs a techno-functional visionary leader with strategic thinking and a strong knowledge of Cloud and Infrastructure solutions with a particular focus on End User Experience/Digital Workplace, Service Desk & Field Support. Someone with a startup mindset and attitude, who is a great motivator, brings people together and act as the catalyst to achieve the best possible solution. A well informed opinion in the use of Agentic Ai and automation principles as levers of driving down client TCO is essential. Critical to the success of the role is someone who can build trusted relationships with account teams and senior clients to drive business growth.  

  

Responsibilities:

* Actively develop and drive strategic and tactical opportunities within the Nordics
* Engage with the client in a compelling and collaborative way to establish trust and understand their business and how Capgemini can help them
* Develop compelling cost effective/compelling solutions using the best of Capgemini to exceed client expectations
* Provide technical and sector guidance and support throughout the sales process, including responding to inquiries, conducting assessments, and developing proposals
* Maintain a deep understanding of the Nordics market and stay up to date with the latest developments
* Participate in industry events and conferences to share your knowledge and expertise and network with customers and partners showing thought leadership
* Act as lynchpin for the Nordic Managed Services and Projects & Consulting UX Delivery organizations to maintain portfolio and delivery capability alignment
* When required, operate as a Solution Lead or Solution Architect to provide essential deal capacity
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders, strategy formation and execution, understanding and navigating across business units and technical practices to shape and coordinate various team inputs for proposals
* Work across our partner organisations to bring the best of their products/services together with Capgemini services (e.g. OSS Providers, DAAS Providers, OEMs, Lakeside and ServiceNow)
* Strong knowledge and experience of industry standards UX tooling platforms is essential

**Your Profile**

* Demonstrable experience of navigating a large matrixed Service Provider type organizations including Run (Managed Services) and Projects and Consulting structures
* Strong transformation/change and solutions expertise
* Full working proficiency in English
* Demonstrated ability to develop and deliver compelling technical demonstrations and presentations
* Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to understand and address complex technical challenges

*As part of our recruitment process, identity verification will be conducted through inspection of your ID card, and background checks may be carried out as required.*

*#LI-JF1*


Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: User Experience Designer
description:
**Company Description**

 Amanda AI is a fully autonomous advertising platform designed to simplify digital advertising. It automates the creation, testing, and optimization of campaigns across platforms like Google, Meta, and Bing. By managing tasks such as setup, targeting, and budget adjustments, Amanda AI eliminates repetitive work while keeping ads optimized for maximum impact. The platform leverages millions of data-driven decisions daily to help businesses achieve their advertising goals efficiently.
   




**Role Description**

 We are looking for a User Experience Designer to join our team in Stockholm County, Sweden. This is a full-time, on-site role where you will design and improve user experiences for our autonomous advertising platform. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include conducting user research, creating prototypes, and implementing design-thinking strategies to enhance usability. Additionally, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop visually appealing and user-centric designs.
   




**Qualifications**
* Expertise in Design Thinking and the ability to brainstorm innovative solutions to user needs
* Strong skills in User Research and an understanding of user behaviors and needs
* Solid experience with Visual Design and creating aesthetically pleasing interfaces
* Proficiency in User Experience (UX) design and developing intuitive navigation systems
* Competence in Prototyping to test and iterate on design ideas
* Excellent problem-solving and interpersonal communication abilities
* Familiarity with tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD is a plus
* Relevant experience or a degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a related field

title: UX/UI Designer with Frontend Development Skills
description:
At Evolution AB / Nolimit City, we create world-class gaming products with bold, uncompromising design and unmatched attention to detail. We're looking for a UX/UI Designer who doesn't just stop at the design phase — you also bring your ideas to life in code.
 



  





 You'll join a cross-functional product team with full ownership over the solutions you design, working on innovative and highly interactive user experiences seen by players around the world. You’ll collaborate closely with engineers to bring your ideas to life—creating products that are both beautiful and usable. Depending on your experience, you might implement parts of the frontend yourself or work alongside developers to ensure your vision is realized in the final product.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 



* Lead UX and UI design efforts for new and existing products — from user flows and wireframes to high-fidelity mockups.
* Translate your designs into functional, responsive, and accessible frontend components using React (Next.js) and TypeScript.
* Partner with developers and stakeholders to iterate on solutions, run experiments, and refine interfaces based on user feedback and performance data.
* Build and maintain components in a shared design system, ensuring consistency and scalability across products.
* Advocate for user-centered design throughout the product development process.



  





**You Might Be a Great Fit If You** 



* Have a strong background in UX/UI design, with a portfolio showcasing thoughtful, elegant interfaces and interaction design.
* Are fluent in modern design tools like Figma, and enjoy prototyping and testing user flows.
* Know how to write clean, maintainable frontend code using React and TypeScript.
* Are comfortable working with developers and understand how design decisions impact performance and implementation.
* Care deeply about usability, accessibility, and the overall user experience.
* Enjoy working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment where experimentation is encouraged.



  





**Bonus Points** 



* Experience with Next.js, Redux Toolkit, or Headless CMSs like Strapi.
* Familiarity with A/B testing, analytics, and data-driven design decisions.
* An understanding of game or entertainment product design patterns.



  





**Technologies You'll Touch** 



* Figma (or other tools you prefer) / Design Systems
* React / Next.js
* TypeScript / JavaScript
* Redux Toolkit
* CSS / Tailwind CSS
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Git (GitHub Actions)



  





**Who we are** 




 You don't need to know everything from day one. If you're a designer who loves to get your hands dirty in code, and you're passionate about crafting exceptional user experiences, we'd love to meet you.
 



  





 Join one of Sweden's fastest-growing companies and help shape the future of interactive entertainment.
 



  





 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
 



 Apply on LinkedIn, or send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
 



 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Digital UX & Web Experience Designer
description:
**Digital UX & Web Experience Designer** 




  





 Som
 
 Digital UX & Web Experience Designer
 
  på Cherry Online blir du en nyckelspelare i att förverkliga våra brand books och, tillsammans med vår Art Director, översätta dem till visuellt tilltalande och välfungerande digitala upplevelser. Du säkerställer att varje varumärkes identitet och färgpalett tas tillvara och implementeras på ett genomtänkt sätt där användarvänlighet, läsbarhet och tillgänglighet alltid står i fokus. Erfarenhet från arbete med appar eller mobila plattformar är meriterande, men ditt huvudsakliga fokus blir att skapa en helhetsupplevelse online för våra varumärken.
 



  





**Dina ansvarsområden** 




  




* Säkerställa att varumärkesidentitet och designlinjer implementeras korrekt i den digitala miljön.
* Äga och utveckla användarresan på våra sajter med fokus på konvertering, retention och engagemang.
* Samarbeta tätt med Art Director, produktägare, marknadsteam och utvecklare för att omsätta koncept till visuella lösningar med fokus på användarupplevelse.
* Optimera flöden genom testning, iteration och datadrivna beslut.
* Analysera användarbeteenden och omsätta insikter till visuella och funktionella förbättringar.



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 




  




* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet inom UX- eller webdesign, gärna från spel, e-handel eller annan digital bransch.
* Har en stark känsla för visuell design och förmåga att säkerställa att varumärkesidentitet och användarvänlighet går hand i hand.
* Är självgående och trygg i att driva projekt från idé till leverans.
* Kan kombinera kreativitet med en analytisk ådra för att skapa både estetiskt tilltalande och funktionella lösningar.
* Har erfarenhet av appar eller mobila applikationer eller ser det som ett område att utvecklas inom.
* Är van vid att arbeta med moderna design- och prototypverktyg för att skapa wireframes och användarflöden.
* Har förståelse för digitala tracking- och analysverktyg och kan använda dessa för att generera insikter om användarbeteenden.
* Kommunicerar tydligt både muntligt och skriftligt på svenska och engelska och kan anpassa tonen efter mottagare och sammanhang.



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 




  





 En central roll i ett internationellt bolag med starka varumärken och hög digital innovationsgrad. Du blir en del av ett kreativt team där ditt arbete får direkt genomslag på hur våra sajter upplevs och används av spelare i Sverige och internationellt. Rollen är placerad i Kalmar eller Stockholm med möjlighet till in-office eller hybridupplägg.
 



  





**Start:** 
 Senast Januari 2026
 



**Placering:** 
 Stockholm eller Kalmar
 



**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid
 



  





 Sök rollen genom personligt brev & CV till: careers@cherry.com
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Staff Prompt Designer, Experience
description:
Come and build how Spotify talks, listens, and learns. We are seeking a Staff Designer to lead all aspects of building and composing natural language prompts and conversational experiences on Spotify's products driven by AI.
   

  

 This position resides where language, interaction, and intelligence converge — the meeting point of inventing and machine learning. You’ll define how Spotify’s AI systems connect with users, crafting experiences that feel natural, expressive, and unmistakably Spotify.
   

  

 Whether you come from content design, product design, or applied AI, you’ll find the freedom to experiment, prototype, and invent the next generation of Spotify experiences powered by conversation and creativity.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Design the Future of AI Interaction: Own the evolution of Spotify’s approach to content and conversation design, developing scalable methodologies for designing with and for AI. Design, refine, and evaluate prompts that power generative and conversational AI experiences, ensuring outputs feel authentic, useful, and aligned with Spotify’s values and tone. Define the voice, tone, and personality systems that guide how Spotify’s AI communicates.
* Build and Experiment: Prototype and experiment directly with large language models, exploring behaviors, capabilities, and creative potential. Develop frameworks and metrics to evaluate and optimise prompting quality, performance, and user impact. Collaborate with engineering, product, research, and data science to integrate AI into cohesive, human-centred experiences.
* Lead and Elevate: Champion ethical, inclusive, and responsible AI communication, ensuring language supports user trust and understanding. Mentor and coach other designers and writers, strengthening our Prompt Design fluency and technical literacy across Spotify. Contribute to internal tools, libraries, and Design Systems that make AI Prompt Design more efficient and scalable.


 Who You Are
   

  

* A senior or staff-level designer experienced in Content Design, UX writing, Interaction Design, or AI Product Design.
* Proficient in how language crafts UX, comfortable with structured data or model outputs (LLMs, APIs, JSON, YAML, Python).
* Experienced in Prompt Design, testing, and optimization; using both qualitative and quantitative methods.
* Thrilled by ambiguity and invention — able to bring transparency and structure to new, fast-evolving problem spaces.
* A problem solver and collaborator, equally comfortable discussing product strategy and modelling behaviour.
* Knowledgeable about accessibility, localisation, and safety in digital communication.
* Motivated by defining new frontiers at the intersection of design, technology, and language.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! For this role, you can be within the EMEA region as long as we have a work location (excluding France due to on-call restrictions).
* This team operates within the Central European and GMT time zone for collaboration


 We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.
   

  

 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: UX/UI-designer till Tre
description:
Vill du vara med och skapa digitala upplevelser som gör skillnad – både för användarna och samhället? Hos Tre får du kombinera kreativitet och användarinsikter med teknik och data för att forma lösningar som förenklar vardagen för hundratusentals människor. Här arbetar vi i en miljö där innovation, samarbete och samhällsnytta går hand i hand.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som UX/UI Designer hos Tre blir du en del av vårt Growth & Experience-team inom Online Consumer Market. Här får du möjlighet att utveckla några av våra mest centrala digitala produkter.
   

  

 I rollen dyker du ner i användarnas behov genom intervjuer, observationer och analys av data, och omsätter insikterna till flöden, wireframes och prototyper som är både intuitiva och affärsmässiga. Du planerar och leder tester, analyserar resultat och itererar tills lösningarna sitter.
   

  

 I vardagen samarbetar du tätt med produktägare, utvecklare, CRO-specialister och webbanalytiker, och tillsammans med våra UX-designers i Sverige och Danmark hittar du lösningar som fungerar på båda marknaderna och möter olika användarbehov. Du bidrar även till utvecklingen av våra designprinciper och komponentbibliotek, med fokus på tillgänglighet, enhetlighet och skalbarhet. Här får du både kreativ frihet och strategiskt ansvar – och chansen att påverka hur våra digitala produkter upplevs av användarna.
   

  

**Du kan se fram emot att**
* Driva kreativa initiativ och testa nya idéer i en datadriven miljö.
* Bidra till att våra digitala tjänster blir mer inkluderande och tillgängliga för alla användare.
* Vara med och påverka hur vi bygger framtidens digitala kundupplevelse hos Tre.
* Vara en del av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser enligt Great Place To Work samt att vi är stolt samarbetspartner till Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar.


 ,
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet av UX/UI-design inom digital produktutveckling, gärna från telekombranschen eller andra komplexa och tekniskt avancerade verksamheter, och som trivs i en miljö där data, hypoteser och användarinsikter styr riktningen. Du har vana av att arbeta med både app och webb, och du använder Figma som ditt främsta verktyg. Du har god förståelse för tillgänglighetslagstiftningen och designar med inkluderande användarupplevelser i fokus.
   

  

 Som person är du nyfiken, samarbetsorienterad och självgående. Du har förmågan att förklara och visualisera idéer på ett tydligt och engagerande sätt, oavsett om du pratar med utvecklare, produktägare eller andra designers. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du kunna kommunicera obehindrat på både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift, och förklarar dina idéer tydligt till olika målgrupper. Du trivs i en miljö där förändring är vardag och ser möjligheter i att samarbeta över team och marknader. Om du dessutom har erfarenhet av att arbeta med designsystem och samarbeten i internationella team ser vi det som ett plus.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Vi tar emot ansökningar via denna annons och kommer hålla intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du bifogar CV och svarar på de frågor vi ställt nedan i samband med att du söker. Vi använder tester för att säkra objektiva bedömningar i samband med urval. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Bakgrundskontroll görs på slutkandidat
   

  

**Välkommen till Tre!**

title: Master’s thesis: Applied AI to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience
description:
**Master’s thesis: Applied AI to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience** 




  





 The home renovation sector is one of the largest in Sweden - yet also one of the last to fully benefit from the power of modern technology. At Dryft, we have built Sweden’s most appreciated home renovation brand while developing our own tech platform, Dryft Core. It powers both the customer experience and the operational efficiency the industry has never seen before.
 



  





 This thesis gives you the opportunity to apply emerging AI technologies to real business challenges. By combining technical skills with business insight, you will develop and demonstrate a highly sought-after skill set for your future career.
 



  





**The subject and focus of the thesis can be tailored to your interests, academic background and preferred areas of exploration so that it aligns with your goals.** 




  





**Purpose of the thesis** 




  





 The project blends
 **exploration, analysis, and practical prototyping** 
 . Your goal is to investigate how businesses of the future will operate in an AI-driven world by exploring opportunities such as:
 


* Improving access to knowledge and decision support in everyday operations
* Enhancing workflow efficiency across internal teams
* Supporting or improving the customer journey through smart tools or interactions



  





 Based on your findings, you will design and prototype AI-supported solutions - either for internal use, customer-facing contexts, or both.
 



  





**Possible focus areas** 




  





 The direction and depth of the thesis will be shaped together based on your background and interests. Examples include:
 


* AI-assisted internal tools for planning, knowledge access, or coordination
* Customer-facing prototypes that improve communication, guidance, or service quality
* Structuring and using organizational data for applied AI
* Human-in-the-loop or co-pilot solutions for real workflows
* Evaluating the impact, usability, and scalability of AI concepts



  





**How you’ll work** 




  





 You will collaborate closely with both the business side and our tech team, with Dryft's CTO as your mentor, to:
 


* Identify real needs through interviews and observations
* Explore data, workflows, and knowledge flows
* Prototype and test AI-driven solutions
* Evaluate their impact on operations and/or customer experience



  





**What we provide** 




  




* Access to real users, problems, and workflows
* Support from both tech and operations stakeholders
* Data, insights, and freedom to shape direction
* Flexible setup (remote + Solna, Stockholm office)
* 60 000 kr compensation



  





**Who this thesis is suited for** 




  





 This thesis can be tailored to your academic background, interests, and preferred direction. The scope and angle will be adapted together to ensure it aligns with your studies and ambitions.
 



  





 You may come from fields such as:
 


* Computer Science / AI / Engineering
* Industrial Engineering / Information Systems
* Service Design / Innovation / Data Science



  





 You are likely to thrive in this thesis if you:
 


* Enjoy exploring how technology can solve real challenges
* Like combining analysis with hands-on prototyping and iteration
* Feel comfortable engaging with both business stakeholders and technical teams
* Are excited by the opportunity to test ideas quickly and learn from real users



  





 You don’t need to have all the answers from the start - an exploratory mindset, problem-solving ability, and interest in applied AI are what matter most.
 



  





**Practical Details** 




  




* Start: Preferably early 2026, but flexible to what suits you
* Location: Hybrid (Remote + Office in Solna, Stockholm)
* Language: English or Swedish
* Supervisor/mentor: Dryft CTO Johannes Ivarsson
* Compensation: 60 000 kr

title: Principal UI Designer
description:
**Craft:**
 Games Design & Production
   

  

**Job Description:**
 Are you ready to take our players on an incredible journey? Do you aspire to create the world’s best mobile games? We are seeking UI talent to help us level up and ensure our games are as inclusive and engaging as possible. You’ll drive our team forward to deliver unforgettable experiences that delight players across the world.
   

  

**Your role within our Kingdom**
 You are an experienced UI Principal Designer, who will exhibit mastery of UI design and act as a role model and mentor for colleagues with less experience in one or more business areas of the product. As a UI Principal you utilize industry best practice and deep understanding of interaction design, art, graphic design, and other principles to improve Candy product and UI design processes. You are keen on identifying complex problems or inconsistencies and design elegant, future-proof solutions to be adopted across the game. You are able to work autonomously, remaining a visible and proactive team player. You are a craft influencer in your business area and cross the game.
   

  

 You support the strategic framework and champion giving UI feedback to the designers, working closely with the Art/UI Director to help bring up the visual aesthetic of the game to the next level. With your passion for player- centric design, you will mentor your team members to make their designs, even more, user friendly and accessible.
   

  

 As a member of the Candy team you’ll participate in a cross-location collaboration. We believe your communication and organization skills will help you to champion our cooperation on features and information exchange among the teams.
   

  

**Experience**
**Skills to Create Thrills**
* 5+ years of experience UI design for mobile games
* You have experience working on UI style guides
* You have proven examples of driving larger projects or initiatives
* You have proven mentorship experience


 Knowledge & Skills
   

  

* You are eager to mentor others and bring their works to the next level
* You are adaptable to the change and able to perform in fast pacing environment
* You have a well- developed sense of visual aesthetics
* You are great at articulate design decisions and present your work to larger groups
* You are confident in analyzing design specs
* You have knowledge of technical constraints and assets optimisation
* You can apply interaction and communication design to your work
* You mitigate risk in project planning. Great understanding of how to produce appealing UI in style within the available time frame and resources
* You have great communication and organizational skills
* You are structured and champion documentation to secure your work
* You have a proactive mindset and is a clear go-to person


**Tasty Bonus Skills**
* Experience in user testing
* Skills in animation, motion design and special effects
* Experience working in an agile project environment
* Interest in growing your influence on the end product quality


 A portfolio demonstrating all aspects of your skill, including any relevant personal projects, is required.
   

  

**About King**
 With a mission of
 *Making the World Playful* 
 , King is a leading interactive entertainment company with more than 20 years of history of delivering some of the world’s most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry, including the world-famous Candy Crush franchise, as well as other mobile game hits such as
 *Farm Heroes Sag* 
 a. King games are played by more than 200 million monthly active users. King, part of Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), has Kingsters in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Dublin, San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles and Malta. More information can be found at King.com or by following us on LinkedIn, @lifeatking on Instagram, or @king\_games on X.

title: Product Managers
description:
*Vill du leda teamen bakom Sveriges största streamingtjänst och vara drivande i resan mot nästa generations tittarupplevelse?*
 Hos TV4 möts teknik, innovation och underhållning. TV4 söker nu Product Managers som vill vara med och forma framtiden för Sveriges största streamingtjänst. Oavsett om ditt hjärta klappar lite extra för användarupplevelse eller affärstillväxt, blir du en nyckelperson i hur miljoner tittare upplever rörlig bild varje dag.
   

  

 Om rollerna
   

  

 Som Product Manager på TV4 blir du en del av Product Competence-teamet och leder ett tvärfunktionellt team inom ett tydligt produktområde, bestående av utvecklare, designers och andra specialister. Du samarbetar nära kollegor inom produkt, tech, design och affär för att skapa en tjänst som både engagerar och levererar mätbara resultat. Du kommer att ha ett nordiskt ansvar, vilket innebär att du arbetar med både TV4 Play i Sverige och MTV Katsomo i Finland. Två marknader där vi tillsammans formar framtidens streamingupplevelse.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som Product Manager till
 **Content Experience** 
 , där du vill driva och utveckla vår användarupplevelse, från sökfunktioner och spelare till interaktioner.
   

  

 Vi söker också dig till
 **Consumer Growth & Retention** 
 , där du vill fokusera på tillväxt, lojalitet och konverteringsoptimering.
   

  

 Gemensamt för båda rollerna är att du arbetar datadrivet, tvärfunktionellt och med starkt fokus på användarvärde. Du växlar mellan strategi och detaljer, och trivs i en miljö där teknik, design och affär möts. Hos TV4 får du möjlighet att påverka i stor skala och vara en del av en organisation på en spännande resa mot empowered product teams.
   

  

**Du kommer att:**
* Definiera och kommunicera produktens roadmap i linje med TV4s vision och strategi.
* Leda product discovery tillsammans med design och utveckling för att förstå användarnas behov.
* Analysera användar- och produktdata för att generera idéer till nya funktioner och produkter.
* Sätta upp och följa upp KPI:er.
* Samarbeta med Area Lead, Engineering Manager och andra viktiga stakeholders för att identifiera lösningar som är önskvärda, genomförbara och hållbara.


 Vem du är
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med produkter med höga krav på användarupplevelse, tillgänglighet och skalbarhet. Du har flera års erfarenhet av produktutveckling inom tech-miljöer och har som Product Manager lett tvärfunktionella team bestående av utvecklare, designers och jobbat nära stakeholders.
   

  

 Du är datadriven och triggas av mätbarhet och tydliga resultat, samtidigt som du har förmågan att se helheten och förstå hur produkt, teknik och affär samspelar.
   

  

 Du är proaktiv och prestigelös, tar initiativ och får saker att hända. Du motiveras av att arbeta i en organisation som befinner sig på en transformationsresa mot empowered product teams, där du får vara med och forma hur framtidens produktarbete ser ut på TV4.
   

  

**Dina styrkor och erfarenheter:**
* Van att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt med produkt, design, utveckling, marknad, CX, försäljning och juridik.
* Erfarenhet av leverans- och lanseringsprocesser.
* Datadriven och analytisk, med fokus på KPI:er och tydliga resultat.
* Trygg teknisk förståelse och förmåga att agera bollplank i komplexa beslut.
* Kan kombinera strategiskt tänkande med hands-on närvaro i det dagliga arbetet.


**Det är ett plus om du har:**
* Teknisk bakgrund är meriterande, till exempel ingenjörsutbildning, eller erfarenhet av att arbeta nära utvecklingsteam.
* Erfarenhet av UX- och användarcentrerad produktutveckling.
* Erfarenhet av affärsnära produktutveckling och konverteringsoptimering.
* Vana vid cyklisk produktutveckling och moderna agila arbetssätt.


 Detta får du hos TV4
   

  

 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm (TV4-huset) med gångavstånd till Gärdets tunnelbana. Kontoret erbjuder eget gym, parkeringsgarage, restaurang samt takterrass. Rollen erbjuder även:
   

  

* Kollektivavtal, med tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag m.m
* Vara en del av TV4s ekosystem och ta del av de tjänster som TV4 erbjuder sina kunder
* Rabatter via Benify
* En genuin kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling där du även har chans att växa inom vår organisation
* Arbete i team där vi tillsammans motiverar och driver TV4: till Sveriges bästa mediaplattform


**Praktisk information**
 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och intervjuer – så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt genom ansök knappen! Den här tjänsten tillsätts i samarbete med Safemind.
   

  

* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med 6 månaders provanställning
* Facklig tillhörighet: Unionen eller SJF. Kontakta unionen@tv4.se eller sjf@tv4.se för frågor.


 Om TV4
   

  

 TV4 har samlat Sverige i över 30 år, dygnet runt, varje dag. Miljontals besöker TV4 Play och våra sajter för att ta del av innehåll, när och var de vill. Din utveckling är viktig, både för dig och för TV4:s fortsatta resa.

title: Digital Project Manager
description:
Overall responsibility
   

  

 As a Digital Project Manager, you ensure that our digital solutions are delivered with high quality, clear structure, and a focus on driving measurable client growth. You plan, coordinate, and follow up on projects — making sure the right expertise is involved at the right time and that results align with defined goals and KPIs.
   

  

**You’ll Collaborate Closely With**
* Developers
* UX/UI Designers
* Performance Marketers and Data Analysts
* Digital Strategists


 You act as the hub of the team — keeping projects on track without needing to be an expert in every discipline.
   

  

 Key responsibilities
   

  

* Plan and coordinate work across digital client projects
* Create structure through project plans, documentation, and clear follow-up
* Ensure deliveries meet agreed scope, budget, and timeline
* Facilitate smooth communication between clients and production teams
* Translate business goals into measurable digital outcomes, together with the analytics team
* Support prioritization and requirements gathering in collaboration with strategists and technical experts


 Client responsibility
   

  

 You act as the main point of contact for clients in your projects, ensuring clear communication, expectation management, and proactive problem-solving.
   

  

**Skills & Experience**
 5+ years of experience managing digital productions such as website development, digital campaigns, or CRM initiatives
   

  

* Technical understanding of web, CMS platforms, and integrations
* Strong organizational and coordination skills
* Confident communicator with both clients and internal teams
* Experience with project management tools (e.g. Monday.com, Jira, Asana) and agile workflows is a plus


 Personal qualities
   

  

* Collaborative and relationship-oriented
* Structured, responsible, and reliable
* Practical and solution-focused
* Curious and motivated to grow in the role


 Enjoys a position where order, attention to detail, and quality delivery are key
   

  

 Seniority
   

  

 We’re looking for someone with 5+ years of experience who confidently leads cross-functional digital teams and takes full ownership of project delivery. You’re decisive, collaborative, and skilled at guiding others — ensuring every project runs smoothly from concept to completion in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

title: Senior User Experience Researcher(Bangkok - Based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose -** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. Our aim is to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you're looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
 Senior User experience Researchers own end-to-end planning, execution, analysis and reporting of research projects, and consistently achieve research outputs needed by Product teams to inform strategic decisions. The research findings of Senior Researchers impact Agoda's business success by informing Product teams regarding design or design process, end user experience, product direction, market strategy or similar.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Master Degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Human Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field
* 10+ years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains
* You are very comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research
* Experience with Qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Experience with Quantitative research (metrics, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data
* You are able to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* You are a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, designers, engineers and other stakeholders (in English)
* You enjoy collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven and creative environment


**Responsibilities:**
 General Role Expectations:
   

  

* Demonstrates critical thinking beyond explicit business requests
* Functions independently in all operational research tasks
* Leads core end-to-end research activities - including driving research objectives, hypotheses, methodology, execution, analysis, and communication


 Research Skills:
   

  

* Good judgement when evaluating research opportunities, e.g. importance, urgency, and impact for team
* Ability to reasonably challenge details of research requests, and propose solid research solutions
* Strong project execution with existing skills while constantly expanding his/her breadth and depth of abilities.
* Knowledge of approaches for both quantitative and qualitative research, effectively triangulating findings, methods, and theories with others.
* Application of tools and inspection methods to quantify the value and efficiency of research
* Ability to adopt and adapt well-established methods according to product/project situations, and innovate new methods in collaboration with more senior researchers
* Knowledge of or ability to quickly learn key software tools common in the field (e.g. for surveys, diary studies, analysis)
* Knowledge of data compliance and ethics in all of their activities.


 Collaboration & Collaboration:
   

  

* Drives cross-discipline/department collaboration via research insights/activities.
* Collaborates efficiently with other researchers and other disciplines, with clear commitments in case of shared ownership.
* Demonstrates excellent communication skills; tailors communication style for different audiences, concise and to the point, open to taking input and feedback


 Research Community Contributions:
   

  

* Contributes to the research community in one or more ways - sharing work/ methodologies, coaching and/or mentoring other core or junior researchers, screening of Research candidates

title: Cloud SW Developer
description:
Do you have a passion for cloud software development and IoT? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you! The Digital and Access Solutions (DAS) business segment within the EMEIA Division is looking for a Cloud Software Developer to join the Wireless Lock product unit in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Here, you’ll thrive in a collaborative and innovative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
   

  

**What would you do as a** 
**Cloud Software Developer**
 You would develop web applications for configuring and operating our wireless locks and systems. Your primary focus would be on cloud front-end development, while also contributing to back-end functionality.
   

  

 You would be part of a cross-functional, agile software team that includes mobile and cloud developers, QA specialists, and a UX designer. Collaboration with our firmware team would be essential to understand device functionality and communication. Additionally, you would work closely with product management to support and enhance the cloud software application.
   

  

 You would also:
   

  

* Contribute to planning activities by analyzing requirements, creating specifications, and breaking down implementation work into epics and user stories.
* Investigate and resolve customer-reported issues.
* Participate in end-user testing activities.
* Continuously explore, evaluate, and implement new technologies.


**The Skills And Experience We Are Looking For**
 We are looking for someone who has:
   

  

* At least 5 years of experience in software development, including a minimum of 2 years working with Angular.
* Hands-on experience with backend development, preferably in Go (Golang), and familiarity with RESTful APIs and cloud service integrations.
* Knowledge of test automation tools such as Jest, Playwright, or Cypress, and experience with CI/CD practices using Git.
* A background in Agile Scrum development and strong communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
* A technical education in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field; a Bachelor's degree or higher is preferred.


 Ideally, you would have experience with several of the following: AWS development (e.g., Lambda, S3, CloudFront), headless CMS—preferably Sanity, AI tools like Cursor and Copilot for code development, and Agile methodologies such as SAFe.
   

  

 You’re a proactive and open-minded individual who takes initiative and enjoys learning. As a natural problem solver, you focus on solutions rather than obstacles. You thrive in cross-functional teams, value collaboration, and are always ready to support others while also seeking help when needed. You share our belief in lean and agile principles and enjoy working in an environment where diverse expertise comes together to drive successful outcomes.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
   

  

* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes.
* A benefits package.
* A dynamic and inclusive work environment.
* The chance to make a meaningful impact in attracting and retaining top talent.


**We review applications regularly, so don't wait**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here.
   

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Khalil Kabakibi, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at khalil.kabakibi@assaabloy.com .
   

  

 Depending on the risk profile for the role, a background screening will need to be performed. Final candidates may therefore be a subject to a background screening. The performance of a background check is subject to consent and based on our Applicant Privacy Notice.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: System Architect - Anesthesia
description:
**With a passion for life**
 Join our diverse teams of passionate people and a career that allows you to develop both personally and professionally. At Getinge we exist to make life-saving technology accessible for more people. To make a true difference for our customers – and to save more lives, we need team players, forward thinkers, and game changers.
   

  

 Are you looking for an inspiring career? You just found it.
   

  

 Join Getinge and strengthen our Product Area Critical Care in Solna as a System Architect. We are now strengthening one of our value creation teams to speed up the software development. You will, together with the team, be responsible for and own the whole product development cycle. The work consists of new development, from concepts and requirements to final product. The team is responsible for core subsystems development related to gas delivery, connectivity, Cyber Security, alarm and monitoring both for new products together with maintenance of our existing products within anesthesia.
   

  

 As a System Architect at Getinge, you will tackle complex interdisciplinary challenges and collaborate with highly skilled colleagues to find innovative solutions. You will contribute to the development of world-leading products in intensive care and anesthesia.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 Your primary responsibility as a System Architect is to drive and take part in the system engineering of our products and ensure that they deliver the required system functionality and performance. This includes activities like system design, requirements engineering, and risk management. Strong documentation skills are essential to secure clear scope, right expectations, and formal requirements, to enable efficient collaboration and development. Risk analysis plays a crucial role in addressing challenges and maintaining the highest quality standards.
   

  

**To excel in this role, you should possess the following qualities:**
* Experience as a System Architect, ideally within the medical technology or related regulated field.
* Experience working with Cyber Security
* Comfortable making critical technical decisions, thriving in high-expectation environments.
* Interest in advanced healthcare and our products in intensive care and anesthesiology.
* Customer-centric mindset, collaborating closely with customers and users to understand their needs through user studies and evaluations.
* Effective collaboration within cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX-designers, developers, and testers.
* Thrive when working with safety-critical systems in advanced healthcare, where functionality and reliability are vital.
* Proactive and self-driven in learning and contributing to the continued development of our products and our organizations capabilities.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Bachelor or Master of Science in computer science, engineering physics, electrical engineering, or equivalent.
* 5 years of experience as a System Architect.
* Experience designing/developing complex mechatronic systems with graphical user interface.
* Risk analysis expertise, addressing potential challenges, and maintaining high-quality standards.
* Experience of requirement and test management software
* Experience with product development in a regulated industry, e.g. medical technology or automotive.
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both written and spoken.


**Personal Characteristics**
 In addition to technical skills, the following personal attributes will contribute to your success:
   

  

* Analytical and systematic problem-solving approach, capable of handling intricate challenges and breaking down tasks effectively.
* Proactive and assertive, leading technology and driving towards common goals
* Ambition for growth, embracing challenging and stimulating tasks.
* Strong documentation skills


 Become part of Getinge's revolution in healthcare technology. Apply now to embark on a rewarding journey with us.
   

  

**Why join Getinge**
 Getinge offers a job in a safe and informal work environment, where we appreciate close team collaboration. We keep an open dialogue between leaders and employees, as well as between teams. We are focused on developing people, and together we will create a plan for learning and competence development when you start your career with us.
   

  

 We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package, including wellness allowances, generous family benefits and joint company activities. Everything to ensure we support your well-being and goals.
   

  

**Application**
 Applications will be reviewed continually, and we therefore recommend sending us your application as soon as possible.
   

  

 We kindly ask you to submit your application in our recruitment system by clicking the “apply now” button. Due to GDPR regulations we do not accept applications via e-mail.
   

  

 If you have any questions regarding the role, please contact Hiring Manager Katarina Dahlén at Katarina.dahlen@getinge.com or Recruiter Sofia Ekstrand at sofia.ekstrand@getinge.com
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application. We hope you will join us on our journey to become the world’s most desired MedTech company.
   

  

**About Us**
 With a firm belief that every person and community should have access to the best possible care, Getinge provides hospitals and life science institutions with products and solutions aiming to improve clinical results and optimize workflows. The offering includes products and solutions for intensive care, cardiovascular procedures, operating rooms, sterile reprocessing and life science. Getinge employs over 12,000 people worldwide and the products are sold in more than 135 countries.

title: Lead Data Science (Bangkok based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose -** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know Our Team**
 The Data department , based in Bangkok , oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
**Please note -The role will be based in Bangkok.**
 We are looking for ambitious and agile data scientists that would like to seize the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging productive machine learning and big data platforms worldwide, processing some 600B events every day and making some 5B predictions.
   

  

 As part of the Data Science and Machine Learning (AI/ML) team you will be exposed to real-world challenges such as: dynamic pricing, predicting customer intents in real time, ranking search results to maximize lifetime value, classifying and deep learning content and personalization signals from unstructured data such as images and text, making personalized recommendations, innovating algorithm-supported promotions and products for supply partners, discovering insights from big data, and innovating the user experience. To tackle these challenges, you will have the opportunity to work on one of the world's largest ML infrastructure employing dozens of GPUs working in parallel, 30K+ CPU cores and 150TB of memory.
   

  

**In This Role, You’ll Get to**
* Design, code, experiment and implement models and algorithms to maximize customer experience, supply side value, business outcomes, and infrastructure readiness.
* Mine a big data of hundreds of millions of customers and more than 600M daily user generated events, supplier and pricing data, and discover actionable insights to drive improvements and innovation.
* Work with developers and a variety of business owners to deliver daily results with the best quality.
* Research discover and harness new ideas that can make a difference


**What You’ll Need To Succeed**
* 4+ years hands-on data science experience.
* Excellent understanding of AI/ML/DL and Statistics, as well as coding proficiency using related open source libraries and frameworks.
* Significant proficiency in SQL and languages like Python, PySpark and/or Scala.
* Can lead, work independently as well as play a key role in a team.
* Good communication and interpersonal skills for working in a multicultural work environment.


**It’s Great if You Have**
* PhD or MSc in Computer Science / Operations Research / Statistics or other quantitative fields
* Experience in NLP, image processing and/or recommendation systems
* Hands on experience in data engineering, working with big data framework like Spark/Hadoop
* Experience in data science for e-commerce and/or OTA


*We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.*
